lead_paragraph: Zivile Balciunaite of Lithuania won the women’s marathon at the European championships in Barcelona, Spain, and Merlene Ottey, 50, became the oldest athlete to compete at the event.
snippet: Zivile Balciunaite of Lithuania won the women’s marathon at the European championships in Barcelona, Spain, and Merlene Ottey, 50, became the oldest athlete to compete at the event.
